mean_cn: adj.单边的，单方面的；（父母）单系的
mean_en: done by one member of a group or an organization without the agreement of the other members
sentence: He made a unilateral announcement of his marriage to his favorite female star.
sentence_trans: 他单方面宣布和他最爱的女明星结婚了。
word_etyma: uni一个，单一 + later边 + al形容词后缀，…的 → 单边的 → unilateral单方面的
